availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Albert L. Tichenor (Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Elizabeth Milton Tichenor in Nelson County, Kentucky on September 30, 1847. Married to Mary K. Duncan Tichenor in Nelson County on August 31, 1855. Married to Mollie Crawford Tichenor in Nelson County on May 4, 1858. Father of Manny Tichenor, Charles Tichenor, Mattie Tichenor, Molly Tichenor, and Lora Tichenor. Farmer in Nelson County, Kentucky in 1860. Employed Jonah Tichenor as a farmer in Nelson County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Nelson County in 1860.
